items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a magic item to apply it.
explicitMods: Reforges a magic item with new random modifiers

items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a normal item to apply it.
explicitMods: Upgrades a normal item to a random rarity

items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a magic item to apply it. Magic items can have up to two random modifiers.
explicitMods: Augments a magic item with a new random modifier

items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a normal item to apply it.
explicitMods: Upgrades a normal item to a magic item

items.descrText: Right click this item then left click an unidentified item to apply it.
Right click this item then left click a normal item to apply it.
explicitMods: Upgrades a normal item to a rare item

items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a socketed item to apply it. The item's quality increases the chances of obtaining more links.
explicitMods: Reforges the links between sockets on an item

items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a map to apply it. Has greater effect on lower-rarity maps. The maximum quality is 20%.
explicitMods: Improves the quality of a map
Attacks with this Weapon have 102% increased Elemental Damage
flavourText: "Stone still, amidst the reeds,
breath fogging in the iron cold air.
he sits, he waits, he watches.
A piscatorial vigil, sat by the river,
his cathedral, his patience his unanswered prayer."
- Jojoba Mansell, bard, angler, adventurer
items.name: Piscator's Vigil

socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 102 to 153 added Chaos Damage
socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies.

items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.
explicitMods: First Impact has 100% more Area of Effect
First Impact deals 325% more Damage with Hits and Ailments
items.secDescrText: Flaming bolts rain down over the targeted area. They explode when landing, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

explicitMods: Gain 4 Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks
flavourText: The First Ones hold us
between two sharpened blades.
That should we stray too far from the path,
we find ourselves severed.
- The Wolven King

items.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 36% increased Area of Effect while Dead
100% chance to Trigger Supported Non-Minion Spells on Death
items.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will be triggered when you die. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.

flavourText: The fire of the hearth is a docile dog,
leashed and tamed.
The fire of the First Ones is a ravening wolf,
wild and free.
- The Wolven King

items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.
items.secDescrText: Fires a projectile from a Wand that causes a series of area explosions in a secondary radius around its point of impact, each damaging enemies.

items.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 3% of Damage Leeched as Life
items.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies, causing those hits to leech life based on damage dealt.

items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.
explicitMods: 165% more Spell Damage for each stage
60% more Damage with Ailments for each stage
items.secDescrText: Channels to build up a large explosion, which is released when you stop using the skill. The longer you channel, the larger the area of effect and damage of the explosion.

items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.
explicitMods: Storm Hits an Enemy every 0.25 Seconds
Creates a storm when you Kill a Shocked Enemy
Buff grants 16 to 66 Added Attack Lightning Damage
Buff grants 16 to 66 Added Spell Lightning Damage
items.secDescrText: Grants a buff which adds lightning damage to spells and attacks. If you kill a shocked enemy, this skill will create a storm, causing lightning bolts to strike enemies around you for a duration. The damage inflicted by this skill is not affected by modifiers to spell damage.

items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.
explicitMods: 1.2% of Attack Physical Damage Leeched as Life
You take 4% of your Maximum Life per second as Physical Damage
You take 4% of your Maximum Energy Shield per second as Physical Damage
25% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Kill
items.secDescrText: Adds a buff that deals Physical Damage over time, while increasing Attack Speed and Life Leech. Killing an enemy while this buff is active refreshes the buff duration, and can grant a Frenzy Charge.

items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.
explicitMods: Buff grants 33 to 49 Added Attack Cold Damage
Buff grants 33 to 49 Added Spell Cold Damage
items.secDescrText: Grants a buff adding cold damage to spells and attacks. If you shatter an enemy, this skill will cause them to explode and deal AoE cold damage to enemies near them. This damage is not affected by modifiers to spell damage.

items.descrText: Travel to this Map by using it in a personal Map Device. Maps can only be used once.
explicitMods: Area has patches of Chilled Ground
Monsters deal 50% extra Physical Damage as Lightning
Monsters are Immune to randomly chosen Elemental Ailments or Stun
Monsters' Melee Attacks apply random Hexes on Hit
flavourText: Whispers from a world apart
Speak my name beyond the tomb;
Bound within the Maelström's heart,
Will they grant me strength or doom?
items.name: Maelström of Chaos

items.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 27% less Projectile Damage
items.secDescrText: Supports projectile skills.

You and nearby allies deal 20% more Spell Lightning Damage

items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.
explicitMods: 0.2 seconds between appearance of Wall sections
items.secDescrText: Creates a wall of ice which holds back enemies. Targets under the wall are damaged and pushed back.

items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.
explicitMods: First Impact has 100% more Area of Effect
First Impact deals 325% more Damage with Hits and Ailments
items.secDescrText: Flaming bolts rain down over the targeted area. They explode when landing, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

explicitMods: On Killing a Poisoned Enemy, nearby Enemies are Poisoned
and nearby Allies Regenerate 200 Life per second
flavourText: Calling it poison would imply
that it was even edible.
items.name: Bino's Kitchen Knife

items.descrText: Travel to this Map by using it in a personal Map Device. Maps can only be used once.
explicitMods:
Contains the Immortalised Grandmasters
PvP damage scaling in effect
flavourText: The grandest and greatest ever to fight,
Divine the champions stand tall.
But match their power, best their might,
And even the immortal may fall.
items.name: Hall of Grandmasters

items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

explicitMods: Gain an Endurance Charge when you lose a Power Charge
flavourText: "We are the soldiers of Faith, armoured in devotion.
Let the sinners come, for we - the Pure - shall endure!"
- Voll of Thebrus, at the Battle of the Bridge
items.name: Voll's Devotion

flavourText: The wyrm draws warmth from the fires of desire.
items.name: Goldwyrm

properties.name: Attack, AoE, Movement, Travel, Physical, Melee

socketedItems.secDescrText: Charges at a targeted location or enemy, pushing away enemies in your path and repeatedly dealing off-hand damage in a small area in front of you. You deal damage in a larger area when you reach the target. The further you travel, the more damage you deal, and the greater your chance of stunning enemies. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.

socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 38% increased Attack Speed
socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports attack skills.

flavourText: In a blaze of glory,
An anomaly defying all odds
The "unkillable" beast met the divine
And Ventor met his latest trophy.
items.name: Ventor's Gamble

explicitMods: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 5 Concentrated Effect
4% reduced Mana Cost per Endurance Charge
Gain Rampage while at Maximum Endurance Charges
Lose all Endurance Charges when Rampage ends
flavourText: Those who witness the shimmering scales of the wyrm
know only fear for the rest of their lives.
Fortunately, the rest of their lives
can be measured in seconds.
items.name: Wyrmsign

items.secDescrText: Attacks an area in front of you. Each Reave that hits an enemy grants stages, which you will begin to lose after a short period without hitting anything. Only works with Daggers, Claws, and One-Handed Swords.

items.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 43% more Melee Attack Speed
Supported Skills deal 21% less Attack Damage
Supported Skills deal 10% increased Melee Damage
First Repeat of Supported Skills deals 22% more Damage
Second Repeat of Supported Skills deals 44% more Damage
items.secDescrText: Supports melee attack skills, making them repeat twice when used, targeting a random enemy each time. Cannot support Vaal skills, channelling skills or triggered skills.

items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

Hits against Cursed Enemies have +1.5% to Critical Strike Chance
Hits against Cursed Enemies have +48% to Critical Strike Multiplier
Cursed enemies grant 576 Life when Killed
Cursed enemies grant 77 Mana when Killed
Cursed Enemies have a 5% chance to grant a Power Charge when Hit
items.secDescrText: Curses a single enemy, making them more vulnerable to Critical Strikes. Killing the cursed enemy will grant life and mana, and a power charge. You can only have one Mark at a time.

Supported Curse Skills apply their Curses as Auras
Supported Curse Skills also count as Aura Skills
92% increased Area of Effect of Supported Curse Skills

items.descrText: Travel to this Map by using it in a personal Map Device. Maps can only be used once.
explicitMods: Contains additional waves of Undead Monsters
flavourText: For his sins he was hunted in his sleep,
judgement wrought of twisted nightmare.
The Coward bound his dreams to stone, awaiting
another to walk the path of true atonement.
items.name: The Coward's Trial

30% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Lightning Damage
flavourText: "There's nothing like imminent death
to galvanize one's purpose in life."
- Malachai the Soulless.
items.name: Lightning Coil

hybrid.secDescrText: Deals attack damage in an area.

properties.name: Warcry, AoE, Duration, Fire, Attack, Trigger, Melee

socketedItems.secDescrText: Performs a warcry, taunting nearby enemies to attack the user and exerting subsequent attacks. Covers enemies in ash, causing them to move slower and take increased fire damage. Affected enemies explode when they die, dealing fire damage in an area.

flavourText: I stood among the stones
And called out to the First Ones;
That with tooth and mighty claw,
They should tear our enemies asunder.
- The Wolven King
items.name: Torment Heart

items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.
items.secDescrText: After a short preparation time, you fire individual projectiles repeatedly with a Bow or Wand. These projectiles have a small randomised spread. This skill cannot be Triggered.

items.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.
explicitMods: Supported Attack Skills cannot be used with Melee Weapons
Supported Skills have a Base Mine Detonation Time of 0.25 seconds
Supported Skills gain a Base Reservation equal to Base Mana and Life Cost
Supported Skills deal 5% more Damage for each prior Mine in Detonation Sequence
items.secDescrText: Supports spells, or attacks that use bows or wands. Instead of using that skill, you will throw a mine that will use the skill for you when you detonate it. Mines cannot use channelling skills.

explicitMods: 100% increased Rarity of Items found when on Low Life
flavourText: Wonders abound at death's door.
items.name: Wondertrap

items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
explicitMods: Dexterity from Passives in Radius is Transformed to Intelligence
flavourText: "The swallow flew fast and took many turns,
spilling a seed where no plant had grown before.
This seed grew and grew until the desert became fertile and abundant.
Your mind is like this seed."
- Maraketh Proverb
items.name: Fertile Mind

items.secDescrText: This spell creates ethereal blades which orbit in an area around you, dealing damage every 0.6 seconds to all enemies in their radius. As more blades are added, the damage becomes greater and more frequent.
